mapper.select: select * from expert where expert_id not in (select distinct expert_id from labwinner_base.base_user where expert_id is not null)
select * from expert where expert_name_ch LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or expert_name_en LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from expert whereexpert_name_ch LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or expert_name_en LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

(select a.*,count(b.journal_article_id) as count from expert a,journal_article b where (expert_name_ch LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or expert_name_en LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) and ( find_in_set(a.expert_name_ch,author) or find_in_set(a.expert_name_en,author)) group by expert_id,expert_name_ch,expert_name_en,country,nation,birthday,record,homeplace, record,research_area,achievement,company,native_place,professional_title,img_url,user_id order by count desc) union all ( select c.*, 0 as count from expert c where (expert_name_ch LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or expert_name_en LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) and expert_id not in (select distinct a.expert_id from expert a,journal_article b where find_in_set(a.expert_name_ch,author) or find_in_set(a.expert_name_en,author)) order by count desc )

(select a.*,count(b.journal_article_id) as count from expert a,journal_article b where find_in_set(a.expert_name_ch,author) or find_in_set(a.expert_name_en,author) group by expert_id,expert_name_ch,expert_name_en,country,nation,birthday,record,homeplace, record,research_area,achievement,company,native_place,professional_title,img_url,user_id order by count desc) UNION all (select c.*, 0 as count from expert c where expert_id not in (select distinct a.expert_id from expert a,journal_article b where find_in_set(a.expert_name_ch,author) or find_in_set(a.expert_name_en,author)) order by count desc)
select count(*) from journal_article where author like concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into expert( expert_name_ch, expert_name_en, country, nation, birthday, homeplace, achievement, native_place, record, company, research_area, professional_title, img_url, source) value( #{expertNameCh}, #{expertNameEn}, #{country}, #{nation}, #{birthday}, #{homeplace}, #{achievement}, #{nativePlace}, #{record}, #{company}, #{researchArea}, #{professionalTitle}, #{imgUrl}, #{source})
